---
category: news
title: "Delhi High Court Makes Available Judgments Translated To Hindi Language On Official Website"
excerpt: "The Delhi High Court has published the Hindi version of some of the judgments passed this year for the understanding of litigants. In a first, a division bench of Chief Justice Satish Chandra Sharma and Justice Subramonium Prasad has made available seven judgments in Hindi language from January 01 to February 28,"
